channel.title: Kernel Help
channel.description:
[code][KERNEL]: machine is too slow to run this server![/code]
That error pops up when i get 20 players onto my server. Can someone tell me what can i do to fix this problem? When i limit the max players to 20 and the player count reaches 20, a fatal error occurs and the server "drops packets" and disconnects.

item.title: Kernel Help
item.dc:creator: @Terrordog Terrordog
item.description:
@Terrordog wrote:

[quote=“gmaster1440, post:3, topic:61339”][quote author=Terrordog link=topic=88400.msg934420#msg934420 date=1172280140]
means your computer is a puccyflow that cant handle 20+ people lol.
[/quote]

very helpful pervert :D[/quote]well i may have a sollution,press ctrl+alt+del then go to process and delete(close down) unneeded stuff there maybe your server will hold up to 30 people if ure lucky.

Read full topic

item.title: Kernel Help
item.dc:creator: @aaa801 aaa801
item.description:

That error pops up when i get 20 players onto my server. Can someone tell me what can i do to fix this problem?
When i limit the max players to 20 and the player count reaches 20, a fatal error occurs and the server “drops packets” and disconnects.[/quote]

buy a better computer
